amendment.description: An amendment numbered 73 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase funding for Community Development Financial Institutions (CDFIs) by $5 million and decreases the General Services Administration Federal Buildings Fund by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham, M. amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A067) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham, M..

Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham, M. amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.
